post:
Hello,

Summer is a quite slow time for business, so this is the reason why we decided to improvise a bit.

This is a special secret promo-code from [NQhost](http://nqhost.com) - **LET66** - **66% RECURRING DISCOUNT**.

You can order Linux VPS for $4.08/month or Windows VPS for $6.8/month! (NQ-1 plans.)

Can be applied to any package - [Linux VPS](http://nqhost.com/unmetered-xen-vps.html), [Windows VPS](http://nqhost.com/unmetered-windows-vps.html), [FreeBSD VPS](http://nqhost.com/freebsd-vps.html), etc.

The promo-code is limited with 30 activations.

What we offer:
Bandwidth Transfer - Unmetered Transfer / Port Speed - 100Mbit shared port / vCPU(s) - 2 CPU (~2.4-3.30 Ghz) / IPv4 & IPv6 - One IPv4 address / Virtualization Type/Platform - Xen / Virtualization Control Panel - SolusVM

Payment Methods - Credit cards, PayPal, Skrill (moneybookers), WebMoney, Yandex.Money

4 Locations (test IP's):

USA, AZ - 198.15.77.202

USA, TX - 173.192.48.124

Russia - 109.68.191.1

Germany - 212.83.40.1

Welcome onboard!
